page.title: 13CHILHAM CASTLE-JOUSTING
page.content: Jousting is carried out in the grounds of Chilham Castle.This is what the performance is like.There are two teams.One is the Black Knight's team and the other is another leading team.They each have a tent opposite the other.There is a fence down the middle.Near the fence is a man dressed up as Henry VIII and a woman dressed up as his wife.Then he tells the two jousters to start. They ride down opposite sides of the fence and try to knock the other off their horses with their lances.If their lance hits the other person's shield they get some points,but if they knock their oppponent off their horse more points are gained.Many people visit Chilham Castle to see the jousting tournaments.
